name: Ni WooCommerce Product Variations Table
author: anzia

sections.description:
Ni WooCommerce Product Variations Table Description

Change WooCommerce default dropdown to variations table with columns header sorting.

Ni WooCommerce Product Variations Table provide the option to customize the columns of variation table like variation image, variation name, product SKU, product price, stock status and stock quantity.

Ni WooCommerce Product Variations Table Feature

  • Change variation dropdown to variation table
  • Columns header sorting
  • Ajax add to cart
  • Setting option for variation table columns customization
  • Report Summary total sales, total order, recent order, order status report

Ni Display Product Variation Table Pro Version Feature

  • Display product variation table or grid instead of default dropdown
  • Show the variation dropdown on product page and category page
  • Show single variation product on shop page and category page
  • Monthly profit Report
  • Add to cart bulk quantity on product detail page in variation table
  • Set the default quantity in variation table
  • Change the display order for table variation columns
  • Set columns of product variation table
  • Dashboard show the product summary report

Ni Display Product Variation Table Pro Buy Now and View Demo

  • View Table Variation Demo
  • View Variation DropDown On Shop Page Demo
  • Buy Now Ni Display Product Variation Table Pro

Support/Feedback Email/New Report Requirement

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback – Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins
  • support@naziinfotech.com

Disclaimer

It is not responsible for any harm or wrong doing this Plugin may cause. Users are fully responsible for their own use. This Plugin is to be used WITHOUT warranty.
sections.installation:
1. Use the WordPress plugin installer or upload files to WordPress plugin directory.
  2. Activate plugin from admin panel.
  3. Ni WooCommerce Product Variations Table.
  4. Find Menu “Product Variation”
sections.faq:
Where i can get help?

Click on support tab or email:support@naziinfotech.com

Do you customize this plugin?

Yes, as per requirement we can customize this plugin.
